comment: They say the requirements for approval of these mRNA-products have not been established. "because no product in which mRNA is the primary active ingredient has been approved, the regulatory pathway for approval is uncertain."

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (t / they)
            :ARG1 (e / establish-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (r / require-01
                        :ARG1 (a / approve-01
                              :ARG1 (p / product
                                    :mod (p2 / protein
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 " mRNA"))
                                    :mod (t2 / this))))))
      :snt2 (h / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (c / certain
                  :polarity -
                  :domain (p3 / pathway
                        :path-of (a2 / approve-01)
                        :mod (r2 / regulate-01)))
            :ARG2 (a3 / approve-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (p4 / product
                        :mod p2
                        :ARG0-of (a4 / activity-06
                              :mod (p5 / primary))))))
